traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: A deep one can breathe air or water with equal ease.

traits.name: Frenzied Rage
traits.desc: On its next turn after a deep one takes 10 or more damage from a single attack, it has advantage on its claws attack and adds +2 to damage.

traits.name: Lightless Depths
traits.desc: A deep one is immune to the pressure effects of the deep ocean.

traits.name: Ocean Change
traits.desc: A deep one born to a human family resembles a human child, but transforms into an adult deep one between the ages of 16 and 30.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.
